featured.text: The reincarnated leaders were always “discovered” in the households of lowly families __(20)__ noble ones.

definition.zh_def: 轉世，指靈魂在死亡後再次以新生的形式存在。
definition.en_def: Having been born again in a new body after death.
definition.example: Many cultures believe that the soul is reincarnated into a new life after death.
